name: pnp-powerapps-samples-power-apps-quality-assurance-assessment
title: PowerApps Quality Assurance Assessment
shortDescription: A Quality Assurance tool integrating with Power Platform Pipelines allowing users to conduct QA Assessments on solutions deployed to a QA Environment.
longDescription: Inspired by the ALM Accelerator by PowerCAT, This solution is built alongside Power Platform Pipelines accessing all deployed solutions within your designated QA Environment. When a solution is in QA, the user can create a QA Assessment for the project, assign it to other users, manage checklist items, and submit a final QA grade for the solution.

name: pnp-powerapps-samples-timer
title: timer
shortDescription: Example of how to use the timer function as a stopwatch
longDescription: This app is an example of how to use the timer function as a stopwatch.
You can specify predefined times and start the timer with them.
An easy to read visualization helps all users to estimate how much time has already passed.
This solution is optimized to use within Microsoft Teams meetings.
